price: 2. Een boodschapper van Allah, die zuivere pagina’s voordraagt.
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
